document_data.name: Sina'zith
document_data.mainbody: '''Sina'zith''' was a [[githyanki]] [[monk]] who died in the 15{{th}} century [[DR]], killed as a result of her interaction with the [[Cult of the Absolute]].
document_data.Description: Sina'zith was a lanky gith woman with yellowish coloration and gray splotches on her skin. She had blue eyes and light brown hair, braided in tight cornrows.
document_data.History: Sina'zith was an outcast among her kin, owing to her dedication to a certain monastic tradition. In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, she came into contact with the Cult of the Absolute and was infected with their altered [[illithid]] tadpole. When Sina'zith's fellow githyanki found out about the infection, she was slain immediately as an aberration. Her soul yearned for revenge and ended up among the hand-picked dozen individuals plucked from the [[Fugue Plane]], chosen by the entity called [[Withers]] to aid in his campaign against the [[Dead Three]] and their Cult of the Absolute.
